wastrel_switchcase.name: SwitchCase
wastrel_switchcase.description: Provides a Switch-Case structure for events.

variable0.name: Variable
variable0.desc: Variable name to be evaluated using case statements.

case1.description: Value to be evaluated against the switch variable.

value0.name: Value
value0.desc: Value to be evaluated against switch variable.

caserange2.description: Range of values to be evaluated against the switch variable, inclusive.

start_value0.name: Start value
start_value0.desc: Start value of range to be evaluated against switch variable.

end_value1.name: End value
end_value1.desc: End value to be evaluated against switch variable.

casecontains3.description: String to search for in switch variable.

contains0.name: Contains
contains0.desc: String to search for in switch variable.

default4.description: Default case, if everything else fails.

caselist5.description: List of values to compare to switch variable.

case_list0.name: Case list
case_list0.desc: List of values to compare to switch variable. Separate values with a comma.

casecompare6.description: Value to be evaluated against the switch variable, using a comparison operator.

is_switch_variable0.name: Is switch variable
is_switch_variable0.desc: Comparison operators for comparing value to switch variable

value1.name: Value
value1.desc: Value to be evaluated against switch variable.

casebreak0.description: Used to bypass remaining case statements.
